Object.Text:
-LV1 stage
0: Go to Main
2: Go to Level2
3: Go to Level3
P: Go to Pause Stage
R: Restart this level
ESC: Quit the demo

Description: Basic topdown physics test.
*Enter: Activates random force to every objects.
*Space: Remove force from all objects.
*Still has a bug on ball-to-box collision...
